title: Database Sys Implement
description: Study of fundamental software components/algorithms of a database system, including the file manager, query engine, lock manager, and recovery manager.  Includes a project component.  Credit not allowed for both CS 4420 and CS 6422.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CS 1332 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and (CS 2200 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3057 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3058 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and CS 4400 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
